about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, 3C IT Solutions & Telecoms (India) Limited is an IT systems integration company. The company offers various IT products and services bifurcated under 3 segments i.e. Infrastructure solutions, Digital business solutions, and Consulting solutions to meet the client requirements.

The company's product and services portfolio includes:

Infrastructure solutions: End User and Devices, Device Configuration, Data Protection, Computer Accessories, Networking Solutions, IT Security Solutions and Audio Video Solutions.

Digital business solutions: MDM- Mobile Device Management, Project Management Tools, Collaboration Software, Video Conferencing Tools, Sales Enablement Software, Cloud Implementation Services and more.

Consulting solutions: Facility Management System (FMS) Solutions, IT Infrastructure Renting Solutions, remote infrastructure management solutions, Multibrand Hardware Break-Fix Service and more.

3C IT offers the following solutions to their clients:

  • Data Storage Management.
  • Server infrastructure solutions that maximise IT investment and deliver high performance.
  • Customized network design and implementation solutions.
  • Security consolidation and optimisation to capitalise on the current investment.

faqs.question: What is the 3C IT IPO?
faqs.answer:
3C IT IPO is a SME IPO of 2200000 equity shares of the face value of ₹5 aggregating up to ₹11.44 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹52 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on June 4, 2024, and closes on June 7, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in 3C IT IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in 3C IT IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in 3C IT IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in 3C IT IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the '3C IT IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When 3C IT IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The 3C IT IPO opens on June 4, 2024 and closes on June 7, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of 3C IT IPO?
faqs.answer: 3C IT IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for 3C IT IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in 3C IT IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is 3C IT IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for 3C IT IPO will be done on Monday, June 10, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, June 11, 2024. Check the 3C IT IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is 3C IT IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The 3C IT IPO listing date is on Wednesday, June 12, 2024.
